definition: to break the rules/an illegality/a foul
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: Now I try to play strong but without the fouls .
sentences.chinese: 現在我正嘗試沒有犯規的強硬打法。

sentences.english: McCamey is quite adept at penetration and getting the foul calls near the basket.
sentences.chinese: 麥卡密擅長突破以及在籃筐附近造犯規。

sentences.english: And you once fouled because of striking.
sentences.chinese: 你有一次曾因爲打人犯規而被罰出場外。

sentences.english: His defense is still really bad, and he fouls alot.
sentences.chinese: 他的防守還是不行，犯規太多。

sentences.english: Committing a foul results in points being deducted from a boxer's score or even disqualification.
sentences.chinese: 犯規要扣掉犯規者的分數，直至取消比賽資格。

sentences.english: Committing a foul results in points being deducted from a boxer's score or even disqualification.
sentences.chinese: 犯規要扣掉犯規者的分數，直至取消比賽資格。

sentences.english: Closed Area defensive side foul, offensive side or indirect punishment completely arbitrary ball.
sentences.chinese: 禁區內防守方犯規，進攻方罰點球或間接任意球。

sentences.english: A basketball player is allowed five personal fouls before fouling out.
sentences.chinese: 籃球運動員侵人犯規五次即被罰下場。

sentences.english: Many rule violations in traditional basketball do not apply in streetball.
sentences.chinese: 傳統籃球中的許多犯規在街球中並不適用。

sentences.english: Tripping results in a 10-yard penalty against the offending team.
sentences.chinese: 絆人犯規犯規隊被判罰10碼開外的點球。

sentences.english: Tripping results in a 10-yard penalty against the offending team.
sentences.chinese: 絆人犯規犯規隊被判罰10碼開外的點球。

sentences.english: A loss of possession of the ball to the opposing team, as by a misplay or an infraction of the rules.
sentences.chinese: 易手，失球把球丟給了對方球隊，如出現失誤或犯規。

sentences.english: He finished regulation time with only four fouls.
sentences.chinese: 他在在這段調整時間內僅僅領到四次犯規。

sentences.english: The reason they didn't take them was because the Suns chose not to foul them.
sentences.chinese: 他們之所以投不進是因爲太陽隊沒有選擇對他們犯規。

sentences.english: Elbowing is a foul in basketball.
sentences.chinese: 打拐子在棒球比賽中是犯規動作。

definition: lapse/mistake/to make a mistake/fault/service fault (in volleyball, tennis etc)
to replace (a damaged component with a new one, an injured player with a substitute player, full-time workers with casual workers etc)/a substitute/a replacement
to deal the fatal blow (sports, chess etc)/to score the winning point
(military) line of troops encircling an enemy position/(telephony) outside line/(basketball) outside the three-point line
